::Spears:;

She walked out of the room and decided to check out the engine room. 
She thought that if she could all the specs she could, she could make 
some prints up for Striker.  She turned and went down the hallway. 
She stopped in at she work bench area to get a mapper and 3-D 
holoscanner.  She went into the engine room and started to get the 
figures.  

She finished with the engine room in a few hours.  She set the 
scanner to project the engines in functioning order and with all 
parts visible on the display.  She looked at the engines with her own 
eyes and saw the gapping holes and bent pipes and ruined plugs and 
gastkets.  She gave a deep sigh knowing it would never be fixed or 
meant to fly again.

She went through most of the ship getting specs and figures.  She 
went outside and scanned the outside of the ship.  She entered data 
to the specs so the holes and other damage wouldn't show in the 
projection.  She made the ship gold colored so it would look nice 
when she presented the specs to the others. 

She smiled when she had the figures all entered into the hand held 
projector.  She walked back inside the ship and went to the room 
where Striker was.  She handed him the projector. "Here, this might 
come in handy."  She smiled, rather pleased with her work. "It's the 
plans and prints for the ship.  I updated them.  I hope it helps with 
the building of the replica."
